document.full_text: vice president joseph biden warned china monday the united states would press hard on human rights, over which the two sides have a "vigorous" disagreement and criticizing beijing's latest crackdown on dissent.
document.title: biden, clinton bluntly press china on rights
lines_and_colors: vice president joseph biden warned china monday the united states would press hard on human rights, over which the two sides have a "vigorous" disagreement and criticizing beijing's latest crackdown on dissent.
